name: GitLab
description: Manage repositories, merge requests, issues, and wikis on GitLab

env.name: Gitlab API URL
env.description: Base URL for GitLab API (optional, defaults to https://gitlab.com/api/v4)

env.name: Use Gitlab Wiki
env.description: Enables the wiki-related tools if set to 'true'.

env.name: Gitlab Read Only Mode
env.description: Restricts the server to only expose read-only operations when set to 'true'. Useful for security or when write access is not needed.
